00035 planar_object_recognizer::planar_object_recognizer()
00036 {
00037   forest = 0;
00038   model_points = 0;
00039   object_input_view = 0;
00040   model_and_input_images = 0;
00041   point_detector = 0;
00042   homography_estimator=0;
00043 
00044   default_settings();
00045 
00046   affine_motion = 0;
00047   H = 0;
00048   detected_points = new keypoint[hard_max_detected_pts];
00049   detected_point_views = new image_class_example[hard_max_detected_pts];
00050   match_score_threshold = .05f;
00051   ransac_dist_threshold = 10;
00052   ransac_stop_support = 50;
00053   max_ransac_iterations = 500;
00054   non_linear_refine_threshold = 3;
00055 }

00057 void planar_object_recognizer::default_settings(void)
00058 {
00059   set_max_depth(10);
00060 
00061   dont_use_bins_when_creating_model_points();
00062   dont_use_bins_when_detecting_input_image_points();
00063 
00064   index_of_model_point_to_debug = -1;
00065 
00066   sample_number_for_refining = 1000;
00067 
00068   max_detected_pts = 1000;
00069   views_number = 1000;
00070   min_view_rate = .4;
00071   keypoint_distance_threshold = 1.5;
00072 }

00074 void planar_object_recognizer::set_max_detected_pts(int max) 
00075 {
00076   if (max > 0 && max < hard_max_detected_pts)
00077     max_detected_pts = max;
00078 }

00128 bool planar_object_recognizer::build(IplImage *model_image,
00129                                                 int max_point_number_on_model, int patch_size,
00130                                                 int yape_radius, int tree_number, int nbLev, 
00131                                                 LEARNPROGRESSION LearnProgress, int *roi)
00132 {
00133   new_images_generator.set_patch_size(patch_size);
00134 
00135   IplImage *model;
00136   if (model_image->nChannels == 1)
00137           model = model_image;
00138   else {
00139           model = cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(model_image), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1);
00140           cvCvtColor(model_image, model, CV_RGB2GRAY);
00141   }
00142 
00143   if (roi)
00144           new_images_generator.set_original_image(model, 
00145                           roi[0], roi[1],
00146                           roi[2], roi[3],
00147                           roi[4], roi[5],
00148                           roi[6], roi[7]);
00149   else
00150           new_images_generator.set_original_image(model);
00151 
00152   if (model != model_image) cvReleaseImage(&model);
00153 
00154   new_images_generator.set_level_number(nbLev);
00155   new_images_generator.set_gaussian_smoothing_kernel_size(yape_radius);
00156 
00157   initialize();
00158 
00159   learn(max_point_number_on_model, patch_size, yape_radius, tree_number, nbLev, LearnProgress);
00160 
00161   return true;
00162 }

00164 
00165 bool planar_object_recognizer::build_with_cache(string filename, 
00166                                                 int max_point_number_on_model, int patch_size,
00167                                                 int yape_radius, int tree_number, int nbLev, 
00168                                                 LEARNPROGRESSION LearnProgress)
00169 {
00170   new_images_generator.set_patch_size(patch_size);
00171 
00172   string dirname(filename + ".classifier");
00173   if (load(dirname)) return true;
00174 
00175   IplImage * model = mcvLoadImage(filename.data(), 0); 
00176   if (model == 0 ) return false;
00177 
00178   string roifn(filename + ".roi");
00179   ifstream roif(roifn.data());
00180   int u[4] = {-1, -1, -1, -1};
00181   int v[4] = {-1, -1, -1, -1};
00182   if (roif.good()) {
00183     cout << "Reading ROI from file " << roifn << ".\n";
00184     for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00185       roif >> u[i];
00186       roif >> v[i];
00187     }
00188     roif.close();
00189   }
00190 
00191   new_images_generator.set_original_image(model, u[0], v[0], u[1], v[1], u[2], v[2], u[3], v[3]);
00192   new_images_generator.set_level_number(nbLev);
00193   new_images_generator.set_gaussian_smoothing_kernel_size(yape_radius);
00194 
00195   initialize();
00196 
00197   learn(max_point_number_on_model, patch_size, yape_radius, tree_number, nbLev, LearnProgress);
00198 
00199   save(dirname);
00200 
00201   return true;
00202 }

00204 planar_object_recognizer::planar_object_recognizer(string directory_name)
00205 {
00206   forest = 0;
00207   model_points = 0;
00208 
00209   load(directory_name);
00210 }
00211 
00212 bool planar_object_recognizer::load(string directory_name)
00213 {
00214   // Read parameters:
00215   char parameter_filename[1000];
00216   sprintf(parameter_filename, "%s/parameters.txt", directory_name.data());
00217   ifstream param_f(parameter_filename);
00218   int yape_radius;
00219   int nbLev;
00220 
00221   if (!param_f.good()) return false;
00222   param_f >> yape_radius;
00223   param_f >> nbLev;
00224   param_f.close();
00225 
00226   new_images_generator.set_level_number(nbLev);
00227   new_images_generator.set_gaussian_smoothing_kernel_size(yape_radius);
00228 
00229   // Read original image:
00230   char image_name[1000];
00231   sprintf(image_name, "%s/original_image.bmp", directory_name.data());
00232   IplImage * original_image = mcvLoadImage(image_name, 0);
00233   if (original_image == 0) return false;
00234 
00235   // Read object corner positions in this original image:
00236   char corner_filename[1000];
00237   sprintf(corner_filename, "%s/corners.txt", directory_name.data());
00238   ifstream cf(corner_filename);
00239 
00240   if (!cf.good()) return false;
00241   int u_corner1, v_corner1, u_corner2, v_corner2, u_corner3, v_corner3, u_corner4, v_corner4;
00242   cf >> u_corner1 >> v_corner1;
00243   cf >> u_corner2 >> v_corner2;
00244   cf >> u_corner3 >> v_corner3;
00245   cf >> u_corner4 >> v_corner4;
00246   cf.close();
00247   new_images_generator.set_original_image(original_image, 
00248     u_corner1, v_corner1, u_corner2, v_corner2, u_corner3, v_corner3, u_corner4, v_corner4);
00249   cvReleaseImage(&original_image);
00250 
00251   // Read keypoints in this original image:
00252   char point_filename[1000];
00253   sprintf(point_filename, "%s/keypoints.txt", directory_name.data());
00254   ifstream pf(point_filename);
00255   if (!pf.good()) return false;
00256   pf >> model_point_number;
00257   model_points = new object_keypoint[model_point_number];
00258 
00259   for(int i = 0; i < model_point_number; i++) {
00260     pf >> model_points[i].M[0] >> model_points[i].M[1] >> model_points[i].M[2] >> model_points[i].scale;
00261     model_points[i].class_index = i;
00262     assert(model_points[i].scale < nbLev);
00263     if (!pf.good()) {
00264       cerr << "problem while reading keypoint #" << i <<" in " << point_filename << endl;
00265       return false;
00266     }
00267   }
00268   pf.close();
00269 
00270   new_images_generator.set_object_keypoints(model_points, model_point_number);
00271 
00272   // Read image classification forest for this object:
00273   forest = new image_classification_forest();
00274   
00275   if ( !forest->load(directory_name) ) 
00276   { 
00277     delete forest; 
00278     return false; 
00279   }
00280 
00281   // Match probabilities:
00282   for(int i = 0; i < hard_max_detected_pts; i++)
00283   {
00284     detected_point_views[i].alloc(forest->image_width);
00285     match_probabilities[i] = new float[model_point_number];
00286   }
00287 
00288   point_detector = new pyr_yape(new_images_generator.original_image->width, new_images_generator.original_image->height, nbLev);
00289   point_detector->set_radius(yape_radius);
00290 
00291   initialize();
00292 
00293   return true;
00294 }
00295 
00296 void planar_object_recognizer::initialize(void)
00297 {
00298   object_input_view = new object_view(new_images_generator.original_image->width,
00299                                       new_images_generator.original_image->height, 
00300                                       new_images_generator.level_number);
00301 
00302   // For motion_estimation:
00303   affine_motion = new affinity();
00304   H = new homography();
00305 
00306   homography_estimator = new ls_minimizer2(8);
00307 
00308   // For visualization:
00309   model_and_input_images = 0;
00310 }
00311 
00312 planar_object_recognizer::~planar_object_recognizer(void)
00313 {
00314   if (object_input_view)   delete object_input_view;
00315   if (point_detector)      delete point_detector;
00316 
00317   if (model_points != 0)
00318     delete [] model_points;
00319 
00320   if (forest != 0)
00321     delete forest;
00322 
00323   for(int i = 0; i < hard_max_detected_pts; i++) {
00324     if (match_probabilities[i])
00325       delete [] match_probabilities[i];
00326   }
00327 
00328   if (detected_points) delete[] detected_points; 
00329   if (detected_point_views) delete[] detected_point_views;
00330   if (affine_motion) delete affine_motion;
00331   if (H) delete H;
00332   if (homography_estimator) delete homography_estimator;
00333 }
00334 
00335 void planar_object_recognizer::learn(int max_point_number_on_model, int patch_size,
00336                                      int yape_radius, int tree_number, int nbLev, 
00337                                      LEARNPROGRESSION LearnProgress)
00338 {
00339   if (point_detector) delete point_detector;
00340   point_detector = new pyr_yape(new_images_generator.original_image->width, new_images_generator.original_image->height, nbLev);
00341   point_detector->set_radius(yape_radius);
00342   point_detector->set_use_bins(use_bins_for_model_points);
00343 
00344   detect_most_stable_model_points(max_point_number_on_model, patch_size, views_number, min_view_rate, LearnProgress);
00345 
00346   save_image_of_model_points(patch_size);
00347 
00348   forest = new image_classification_forest(patch_size, patch_size, model_point_number, max_depth, tree_number, LearnProgress);
00349 
00350   // Pick m1 and m2 at random in each node of each tree
00351   forest->create_trees_at_random();
00352 
00353   // Refine posterior probabilities for each leaf of each tree
00354   forest->refine(/* example_generator */ &new_images_generator, /* call number to generate_random_examples */ sample_number_for_refining);
00355   forest->test(/* example_generator */ &new_images_generator, /* call number to generate_random_examples */ 50);
00356 
00357   for(int i = 0; i < hard_max_detected_pts; i++)
00358   {
00359     detected_point_views[i].alloc(patch_size);
00360     match_probabilities[i] = new float[model_point_number];
00361   }
00362 }
00363 
00364 void planar_object_recognizer::save(string directory_name)
00365 {
00366 #ifndef WIN32
00367   mkdir(directory_name.data(), S_IRWXU | S_IRGRP | S_IXGRP | S_IROTH | S_IWOTH);
00368 #else
00369   _mkdir(directory_name.data());
00370 #endif
00371 
00372   char image_name[1000];
00373   sprintf(image_name, "%s/original_image.bmp", directory_name.data());
00374   mcvSaveImage(image_name, new_images_generator.original_image);
00375 
00376   char corner_filename[1000];
00377   sprintf(corner_filename, "%s/corners.txt", directory_name.data());
00378   ofstream cf(corner_filename);
00379   cf << new_images_generator.u_corner1 << " " << new_images_generator.v_corner1 << endl;
00380   cf << new_images_generator.u_corner2 << " " << new_images_generator.v_corner2 << endl;
00381   cf << new_images_generator.u_corner3 << " " << new_images_generator.v_corner3 << endl;
00382   cf << new_images_generator.u_corner4 << " " << new_images_generator.v_corner4 << endl;
00383   cf.close();
00384 
00385   char parameter_filename[1000];
00386   sprintf(parameter_filename, "%s/parameters.txt", directory_name.data());
00387   ofstream param_f(parameter_filename);
00388   param_f << point_detector->get_radius() << endl;
00389   param_f << new_images_generator.level_number << endl;
00390   param_f.close();
00391 
00392   char point_filename[1000];
00393   sprintf(point_filename, "%s/keypoints.txt", directory_name.data());
00394   ofstream pf(point_filename);
00395   pf << model_point_number << endl; 
00396   for(int i = 0; i < model_point_number; i++)
00397     pf << model_points[i].M[0] << " " << model_points[i].M[1] 
00398     << " " << model_points[i].M[2]
00399     << " " << model_points[i].scale << endl;
00400   pf.close();
00401 
00402   forest->save(directory_name);
00403 }
00404 
00405 void planar_object_recognizer::detect_points(IplImage * input_image)
00406 {
00407   check_target_size(input_image);
00408   point_detector->set_use_bins(use_bins_for_input_image);
00409   point_detector->set_tau(10);
00410 
00411   detected_point_number = point_detector->pyramidBlurDetect(input_image, 
00412                                                             detected_points, max_detected_pts, 
00413                                                             &object_input_view->image);
00414 }
00415 
00416 void planar_object_recognizer::preprocess_points(void)
00417 {
00418   int patch_size = forest->image_width;
00419 
00420   object_input_view->comp_gradient();
00421 
00422   for(int i = 0; i < detected_point_number; i++)
00423   {
00424     image_class_example * pv = &(detected_point_views[i]);
00425     pv->point2d = &(detected_points[i]);
00426     float u = pv->point2d->u, v = pv->point2d->v;
00427     int s = int(pv->point2d->scale);
00428 
00429     if (u > (patch_size/2) && u < object_input_view->image[s]->width - (patch_size/2) && 
00430         v > (patch_size/2) && v < object_input_view->image[s]->height - (patch_size/2))
00431     {
00432       new_images_generator.preprocess_point_view(pv, object_input_view);
00433 
00434       if (0) mcvSaveImage("patches/detected_%03d_corrected.bmp", i, pv->preprocessed);
00435     }
00436   }
00437 }
00438 
00439 void planar_object_recognizer::match_points(bool fill_match_struct)
00440 {
00441   match_number = 0;
00442 
00443   int patch_size = forest->image_width;
00444 
00445   for(int i = 0; i < detected_point_number; i++)
00446   {
00447     image_class_example * pv = &(detected_point_views[i]);
00448     float u = pv->point2d->u, v = pv->point2d->v;
00449     int s = int(pv->point2d->scale);
00450 
00451     if (u > (patch_size/2) && u < object_input_view->image[s]->width - (patch_size/2) && 
00452         v > (patch_size/2) && v < object_input_view->image[s]->height - (patch_size/2))
00453     {
00454       forest->posterior_probabilities(pv, match_probabilities[i]);
00455 
00456       if (fill_match_struct) {
00457         int model_point_index = 0;
00458         float score = match_probabilities[i][model_point_index];
00459         for(int j = 1; j < model_point_number; j++)
00460           if (match_probabilities[i][j] > score)
00461           {
00462             score = match_probabilities[i][j];
00463             model_point_index = j;
00464           }
00465           image_object_point_match * match = &(matches[match_number]);
00466           match->image_point = pv->point2d;
00467           match->object_point = &(model_points[model_point_index]);
00468           match->score = score;
00469 
00470           match_number++;
00471       }
00472     }
00473     else
00474       memset(match_probabilities[i], 0, sizeof(float) * model_point_number);
00475   }
00476 }
00477 
00478 bool planar_object_recognizer::detect(IplImage * input_image)
00479 {
00480   detect_points(input_image);
00481   preprocess_points();
00482 
00483   match_points();
00484 
00485   object_is_detected = false;
00486 
00487   object_is_detected = estimate_affine_transformation(); // Estimation of "affine_motion" using Ransac.
00488   
00489   affine_motion->transform_point(float(new_images_generator.u_corner1), 
00490                                  float(new_images_generator.v_corner1), &detected_u_corner1, &detected_v_corner1);
00491   affine_motion->transform_point(float(new_images_generator.u_corner2), 
00492                                  float(new_images_generator.v_corner2), &detected_u_corner2, &detected_v_corner2);
00493   affine_motion->transform_point(float(new_images_generator.u_corner3), 
00494                                  float(new_images_generator.v_corner3), &detected_u_corner3, &detected_v_corner3);
00495   affine_motion->transform_point(float(new_images_generator.u_corner4), 
00496                                  float(new_images_generator.v_corner4), &detected_u_corner4, &detected_v_corner4);
00497 
00498   if (object_is_detected)
00499   {
00500     object_is_detected = estimate_homographic_transformation_nonlinear_method();
00501 
00502     if (object_is_detected)
00503     {
00504       H->transform_point(float(new_images_generator.u_corner1), 
00505                          float(new_images_generator.v_corner1), &detected_u_corner1, &detected_v_corner1);
00506       H->transform_point(float(new_images_generator.u_corner2), 
00507                          float(new_images_generator.v_corner2), &detected_u_corner2, &detected_v_corner2);
00508       H->transform_point(float(new_images_generator.u_corner3),
00509                          float(new_images_generator.v_corner3), &detected_u_corner3, &detected_v_corner3);
00510       H->transform_point(float(new_images_generator.u_corner4), 
00511                          float(new_images_generator.v_corner4), &detected_u_corner4, &detected_v_corner4);
00512 
00513       //cout << "-------------------------" << endl;
00514       //cout << *H << endl;
00515     }
00516 
00517     object_is_detected = true;
00518     /*
00519     cout << detected_u_corner1 << " x " << detected_v_corner1 << ", "
00520          << detected_u_corner2 << " x " << detected_v_corner2 << ", "
00521          << detected_u_corner3 << " x " << detected_v_corner3 << ", "
00522          << detected_u_corner4 << " x " << detected_v_corner4 << endl;
00523      */
00524   }
00525 
00526   return object_is_detected;
00527 }
00528 
00529 //
00530 // ESTIMATING THE MOTION: ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00531 //
00532 
00533 
00534 bool planar_object_recognizer::three_random_correspondences(int * n1, int * n2, int * n3)
00535 {
00536   if (match_number == 0) 
00537     return false;
00538 
00539   int shot = 0;
00540   do
00541   {
00542     *n1 = rand() % match_number;
00543     shot++; if (shot > 100) return false;
00544   }
00545   while(matches[*n1].score < match_score_threshold);
00546 
00547   shot = 0;
00548   do
00549   {
00550     *n2 = rand() % match_number;
00551     shot++; if (shot > 100) return false;
00552   }
00553   while(matches[*n2].score < match_score_threshold || *n2 == *n1);
00554 
00555   shot = 0;
00556   do
00557   {
00558     *n3 = rand() % match_number;
00559     shot++; if (shot > 100) return false;
00560   }
00561   while(matches[*n3].score < match_score_threshold || *n3 == *n1 || *n3 == *n2);
00562 
00563   return true;
00564 }
00565 
00566 #define RANSAC_DIST_THRESHOLD ransac_dist_threshold
00567 
00568 int planar_object_recognizer::compute_support_for_affine_transformation(affinity * A)
00569 {
00570   int result = 0;
00571 
00572   if (!valid(A))
00573   {
00574     for(int i = 0; i < match_number; i++)
00575       matches[i].inlier = false;
00576 
00577     return 0;
00578   }
00579 
00580   for(int i = 0; i < match_number; i++)
00581   {
00582     image_object_point_match * match = &(matches[i]);
00583 
00584     float mu = PyrImage::convCoordf(float(match->object_point->M[0]), int(match->object_point->scale), 0);
00585     float mv = PyrImage::convCoordf(float(match->object_point->M[1]), int(match->object_point->scale), 0);
00586 
00587     float du = PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, int(match->image_point->scale), 0);
00588     float dv = PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, int(match->image_point->scale), 0);
00589     float tu, tv;
00590 
00591     A->transform_point(mu, mv, &tu, &tv);
00592 
00593     if ((du - tu) * (du - tu) + (dv - tv) * (dv - tv) < RANSAC_DIST_THRESHOLD * RANSAC_DIST_THRESHOLD)
00594     {
00595       result++;
00596       match->inlier = true;
00597     }
00598     else
00599       match->inlier = false;
00600   }
00601 
00602   return result;
00603 }
00604 
00605 bool planar_object_recognizer::valid(affinity * A)
00606 {
00607   float det = float(cvmGet(A, 0, 0) * cvmGet(A, 1, 1) - cvmGet(A, 1, 0) * cvmGet(A, 0, 1));
00608 
00609   if (det < 0. || det > 4 * 4)
00610     return false;
00611 
00612   return true;
00613 }
00614 
00615 bool planar_object_recognizer::estimate_affine_transformation(void)
00616 {
00617   affinity * A = new affinity();
00618   int iteration = 0;
00619 
00620   int best_support = -1;
00621   do
00622   {
00623     int n1, n2, n3;
00624 
00625     iteration++;
00626 
00627     // Choose three correspondences randomly
00628     if (!three_random_correspondences(&n1, &n2, &n3))
00629     {
00630       //cerr << "No three random correspondences found." << endl;
00631       break;
00632     }
00633 
00634     image_object_point_match * m1 = matches + n1;
00635     image_object_point_match * m2 = matches + n2;
00636     image_object_point_match * m3 = matches + n3;
00637 
00638     // Estimation of A (affine matrix) from the 3 correspondences:
00639     A->estimate
00640       (
00641         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m1->object_point->M[0]), int(m1->object_point->scale), 0),
00642         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m1->object_point->M[1]), int(m1->object_point->scale), 0),
00643 
00644         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m1->image_point->u), int(m1->image_point->scale), 0),
00645         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m1->image_point->v), int(m1->image_point->scale), 0),
00646 
00647         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m2->object_point->M[0]), int(m2->object_point->scale), 0),
00648         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m2->object_point->M[1]), int(m2->object_point->scale), 0),
00649 
00650         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m2->image_point->u), int(m2->image_point->scale), 0),
00651         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m2->image_point->v), int(m2->image_point->scale), 0),
00652 
00653         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m3->object_point->M[0]), int(m3->object_point->scale), 0),
00654         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m3->object_point->M[1]), int(m3->object_point->scale), 0),
00655 
00656         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m3->image_point->u), int(m3->image_point->scale), 0),
00657         PyrImage::convCoordf(float(m3->image_point->v), int(m3->image_point->scale), 0)
00658       );
00659 
00660     int support = compute_support_for_affine_transformation(A);
00661 
00662     if (support > best_support)
00663     {
00664       best_support = support;
00665       cvmCopy(A, affine_motion);
00666       if (best_support > ransac_stop_support)
00667         break;
00668     }
00669   } while(iteration < max_ransac_iterations);
00670 
00671   delete A;
00672 
00673   //cout << "Found support of " << best_support << " after " << iteration << " iterations." << endl;
00674 
00675   int support = compute_support_for_affine_transformation(affine_motion);
00676 
00677   return support > 10;
00678 }
00679 
00680 bool planar_object_recognizer::estimate_homographic_transformation_linear_method(void)
00681 {
00682   int inlier_number = 0;
00683   int i;
00684 
00685   for(i = 0; i < match_number; i++)
00686     if (matches[i].inlier)
00687       inlier_number++;
00688 
00689   if (inlier_number < 10)
00690   {
00691     object_is_detected = false;
00692     return false;
00693   }
00694 
00695   H->set_match_number(inlier_number);
00696   for(i = 0; i < match_number; i++)
00697     if (matches[i].inlier)
00698       H->add_match(
00699       PyrImage::convCoordf(float(matches[i].object_point->M[0]), int(matches[i].object_point->scale), 0),
00700       PyrImage::convCoordf(float(matches[i].object_point->M[1]), int(matches[i].object_point->scale), 0),
00701       PyrImage::convCoordf(matches[i].image_point->u, int(matches[i].image_point->scale), 0),
00702       PyrImage::convCoordf(matches[i].image_point->v, int(matches[i].image_point->scale), 0));
00703 
00704   H->estimate();
00705 
00706   return true;
00707 } 
00708 
00709 static void homography_error(
00710                              const ls_minimizer2::flt_t * state, 
00711                              const ls_minimizer2::flt_t *d, int dsize,
00712                              ls_minimizer2::flt_t *b,
00713                              ls_minimizer2::flt_t *J, 
00714                              void ** /*user_data*/)
00715 {
00716   double den = 1. / (state[6] * d[0] + state[7] * d[1] + 1.);
00717 
00718   b[0] = (state[0] * d[0] + state[1] * d[1] + state[2]) * den;
00719   b[1] = (state[3] * d[0] + state[4] * d[1] + state[5]) * den;
00720 
00721   if (J != 0)
00722   {
00723     J[0] = d[0] * den;
00724     J[1] = d[1] * den;
00725     J[2] =      den;
00726     J[3] = 0;
00727     J[4] = 0;
00728     J[5] = 0;
00729     J[6] = -b[0] * J[0];
00730     J[7] = -b[0] * J[1];
00731 
00732     J[8]  = 0;
00733     J[9]  = 0;
00734     J[10] = 0;
00735     J[11] = J[0];
00736     J[12] = J[1];
00737     J[13] = J[2];
00738     J[14] = -b[1] * J[11];
00739     J[15] = -b[1] * J[12];
00740   }
00741 }
00742 
00743 bool planar_object_recognizer::estimate_homographic_transformation_nonlinear_method(void)
00744 {
00745         int inlier_number = 0;
00746 
00747         for(int i = 0; i < match_number; i++)
00748                 if (matches[i].inlier)
00749                         inlier_number++;
00750 
00751         if (inlier_number < 10)
00752         {
00753                 object_is_detected = false;
00754                 return false;
00755         }
00756 
00757         homography_estimator->set_verbose_level(0);
00758 
00759         homography_estimator->reset_observations();
00760         for(int i = 0; i < match_number; i++)
00761                 if (matches[i].inlier) {
00762                         ls_minimizer2::flt_t d[2] = {
00763                                 PyrImage::convCoordf(float(matches[i].object_point->M[0]), int(matches[i].object_point->scale), 0),
00764                                 PyrImage::convCoordf(float(matches[i].object_point->M[1]), int(matches[i].object_point->scale), 0)};
00765                         ls_minimizer2::flt_t b[2] = {
00766                                 PyrImage::convCoordf(matches[i].image_point->u, int(matches[i].image_point->scale), 0),
00767                                 PyrImage::convCoordf(matches[i].image_point->v, int(matches[i].image_point->scale), 0)};
00768                         homography_estimator->add_observation_2data_2measures(homography_error, d, b);
00769                 }
00770 
00771         double initial_state[8] = {affine_motion->cvmGet(0, 0), affine_motion->cvmGet(0, 1), affine_motion->cvmGet(0, 2),
00772                 affine_motion->cvmGet(1, 0), affine_motion->cvmGet(1, 1), affine_motion->cvmGet(1, 2),
00773                 0, 0};
00774         homography_estimator->minimize_using_levenberg_marquardt_from(initial_state);
00775 
00776         double * state = homography_estimator->state;
00777 
00778         H->cvmSet(0, 0, state[0]); H->cvmSet(0, 1, state[1]); H->cvmSet(0, 2, state[2]); 
00779         H->cvmSet(1, 0, state[3]); H->cvmSet(1, 1, state[4]); H->cvmSet(1, 2, state[5]); 
00780         H->cvmSet(2, 0, state[6]); H->cvmSet(2, 1, state[7]); H->cvmSet(2, 2, 1.); 
00781 
00782         homography_estimator->reset_observations();
00783         for (int iter=0; iter<2; iter++) {
00784                 inlier_number=0;
00785                 for (int i=0; i<match_number; i++) {
00786                         double tu = PyrImage::convCoordf(matches[i].image_point->u,     int(matches[i].image_point->scale),     0);
00787                         double tv = PyrImage::convCoordf(matches[i].image_point->v,     int(matches[i].image_point->scale),     0);
00788                         double mu = PyrImage::convCoordf(float(matches[i].object_point->M[0]), int(matches[i].object_point->scale), 0);
00789                         double mv = PyrImage::convCoordf(float(matches[i].object_point->M[1]), int(matches[i].object_point->scale), 0);
00790                         double hmu, hmv;
00791                         H->transform_point(mu, mv, &hmu, &hmv);
00792                         double du = hmu-tu;
00793                         double dv = hmv-tv;
00794 
00795                         if (sqrt(du*du+dv*dv)< non_linear_refine_threshold) { 
00796                                 matches[i].inlier=true;
00797                                 inlier_number++;
00798                                 if (iter==0) {
00799                                         ls_minimizer2::flt_t d[2] = { mu, mv };
00800                                         ls_minimizer2::flt_t b[2] = { tu, tv };
00801                                         homography_estimator->add_observation_2data_2measures(homography_error, d, b);
00802                                 }
00803                         } else {
00804                                 matches[i].inlier=false;
00805                         }
00806                 }
00807                 if (iter==0 && inlier_number>10){
00808                         homography_estimator->minimize_using_levenberg_marquardt_from(state);
00809                         state = homography_estimator->state;
00810 
00811                         H->cvmSet(0, 0, state[0]); H->cvmSet(0, 1, state[1]); H->cvmSet(0, 2, state[2]); 
00812                         H->cvmSet(1, 0, state[3]); H->cvmSet(1, 1, state[4]); H->cvmSet(1, 2, state[5]); 
00813                         H->cvmSet(2, 0, state[6]); H->cvmSet(2, 1, state[7]); H->cvmSet(2, 2, 1.); 
00814                 }
00815         }
00816         if (inlier_number       < 10){
00817                 object_is_detected = false;
00818                 return false;
00819         }
00820 
00821         homography_estimator->reset_observations();
00822 
00823         return true;
00824 } 
00825 
00826 void planar_object_recognizer::save_patch_before_and_after_correction(IplImage * image_before_smoothing,
00827                                                                       int u, int v, int patch_size,
00828                                                                       image_class_example * pv,
00829                                                                       int point_index, 
00830                                                                       int call_number)
00831 {
00832   char name[1000];
00833 
00834   IplImage * p = mcvGetPatch(image_before_smoothing, u, v, patch_size, patch_size);
00835   sprintf(name, "patches/kp_%03d_%04d.bmp", point_index, call_number);
00836   printf("Saving image in %s\n", name);
00837   mcvSaveImage(name, p);
00838   cvReleaseImage(&p);
00839 
00840   sprintf(name, "patches/kp_%03d_%04d_corrected.bmp", point_index, call_number);
00841   mcvSaveImage(name, pv->preprocessed);
00842 }
00843 
00845 
00846 pair<object_keypoint, int> * planar_object_recognizer::search_for_existing_model_point(vector< pair<object_keypoint, int> > * tmp_model_points,
00847                                                                                        float cu, float cv, int scale)
00848 {
00849   for(vector< pair<object_keypoint, int> >::iterator it = tmp_model_points->begin();
00850     it < tmp_model_points->end();
00851     it++)
00852     if (int(it->first.scale) == scale)
00853     { 
00854       float dist2 = 
00855         (float(it->first.M[0]) - cu) * (float(it->first.M[0]) - cu) + 
00856         (float(it->first.M[1]) - cv) * (float(it->first.M[1]) - cv);
00857 
00858       if (dist2 < keypoint_distance_threshold * keypoint_distance_threshold)
00859         return &(*it);
00860     }
00861 
00862     return 0;
00863 }
00864 
00865 bool cmp_tmp_model_points(pair<object_keypoint, int> p1, pair<object_keypoint, int> p2)
00866 {
00867   return p1.second > p2.second;
00868 }
00869 
00870 // Selection of the interest points from the image model
00871 void planar_object_recognizer::detect_most_stable_model_points(int max_point_number_on_model, 
00872                                                                int patch_size,
00873                                                                int view_nb, double min_view_rate,
00874                                                                LEARNPROGRESSION LearnProgress)
00875 {
00876   cout << "Determining most stable points:" << endl;
00877 
00878   vector< pair<object_keypoint, int> > tmp_model_points;
00879   int K = 1;
00880 
00881   keypoint * model_points_2d = new keypoint[K * max_point_number_on_model];
00882 
00883   // First detection of interest points in the image model (frontal view):
00884   int model_point2d_number = point_detector->pyramidBlurDetect(new_images_generator.original_image, model_points_2d, 
00885                                                                K * max_point_number_on_model);
00886 
00887   // Save an image of the interest points detected in the frontal view
00888   model_point_number = 0;
00889   model_points = new object_keypoint[max_point_number_on_model];
00890   for(int i = 0; i < model_point2d_number; i++)
00891   {
00892     keypoint * k = model_points_2d + i;
00893     if (new_images_generator.inside_roi( // Keep point only if it is on the target roi
00894                                         int(PyrImage::convCoordf(k->u, int(k->scale), 0)),
00895                                         int(PyrImage::convCoordf(k->v, int(k->scale), 0))))
00896     {
00897       model_points[model_point_number].M[0]  = k->u;
00898       model_points[model_point_number].M[1]  = k->v;
00899       model_points[model_point_number].M[2]  = 0; 
00900       model_points[model_point_number].scale = k->scale;
00901 
00902       model_point_number++;
00903 
00904       if (model_point_number >= max_point_number_on_model)
00905         break;
00906     }
00907   }
00908 
00909   save_image_of_model_points(patch_size, "initial_model_points.bmp");
00910   delete [] model_points;
00911 
00912   // Create tmp_model_points (vector) from model_points_2d (array of keypoints)
00913   // tmp_model_points will be used afterward
00914   for(int i = 0; i < model_point2d_number; i++)
00915   { 
00916     keypoint * k = model_points_2d + i;
00917 
00918     if (new_images_generator.inside_roi( // Keep point only if it is on the target roi
00919                                         int(PyrImage::convCoordf(k->u, int(k->scale), 0)),
00920                                         int(PyrImage::convCoordf(k->v, int(k->scale), 0))))
00921     {
00922       pair<object_keypoint, int> * mp = search_for_existing_model_point(&tmp_model_points, k->u, k->v, int(k->scale));
00923 
00924       if (mp != 0) // Agglomerate clustered keypoints into one single keypoint
00925       {
00926         double n = double(++mp->second);
00927         mp->first.M[0] = (mp->first.M[0]*(n-1) + k->u)/n;
00928         mp->first.M[1] = (mp->first.M[1]*(n-1) + k->v)/n;
00929       }
00930       else
00931       {
00932         object_keypoint op;
00933         op.M[0] = k->u;
00934         op.M[1] = k->v;
00935         op.M[2] = 0;
00936         op.scale = k->scale;
00937         tmp_model_points.push_back(pair<object_keypoint, int>(op, 1));
00938       }
00939     }
00940   }
00941 
00942 
00943   // Generate random views and run detection on each view to determine the most frequent interest points
00944   bool use_random_background = new_images_generator.use_random_background;
00945   new_images_generator.set_use_random_background(false);
00946   
00947   for(int j = 0; j < view_nb; j++) 
00948   {
00949     if (LearnProgress!=0) 
00950       LearnProgress(DETECT_MODEL_POINTS, j, view_nb);
00951     else
00952       cout << "Generating views: " << view_nb - j << "         \r" << flush;
00953 
00954     new_images_generator.generate_random_affine_transformation();
00955     new_images_generator.generate_object_view();
00956 
00957     int current_detected_point_number = point_detector->detect(&(new_images_generator.smoothed_generated_object_view->image), 
00958                                                                  model_points_2d, K * max_point_number_on_model);
00959 
00960     for(int i = 0; i < current_detected_point_number; i++)
00961     {
00962       keypoint * k = model_points_2d + i;
00963       float nu, nv;
00964       new_images_generator.inverse_affine_transformation(PyrImage::convCoordf(k->u, int(k->scale), 0), 
00965                                                          PyrImage::convCoordf(k->v, int(k->scale), 0),
00966                                                          nu, nv);
00967 
00968       nu = PyrImage::convCoordf(nu, 0, int(k->scale));
00969       nv = PyrImage::convCoordf(nv, 0, int(k->scale));
00970 
00971       keypoint kd;
00972       kd.u = nu;
00973       kd.v = nv;
00974       kd.scale = k->scale;
00975       if (new_images_generator.inside_roi( // Keep point only if it is on the target roi
00976                                           int(PyrImage::convCoordf(k->u, int(k->scale), 0)),
00977                                           int(PyrImage::convCoordf(k->v, int(k->scale), 0))))
00978       {
00979         pair<object_keypoint, int> * mp = search_for_existing_model_point(&tmp_model_points, nu, nv, int(k->scale));
00980 
00981         if (mp != 0)  // Agglomerate clustered keypoints into one single keypoint
00982         {
00983           // move the keypoint coordinates in the center of gravity of
00984           // all agglomerated keypoints.
00985           double n = double(++mp->second);
00986           mp->first.M[0] = (mp->first.M[0]*(n-1) + nu)/n;
00987           mp->first.M[1] = (mp->first.M[1]*(n-1) + nv)/n;
00988         }
00989         else
00990         {
00991           object_keypoint op;
00992           op.M[0] = nu;
00993           op.M[1] = nv;
00994           op.M[2] = 0;
00995           op.scale = k->scale;
00996           tmp_model_points.push_back(pair<object_keypoint, int>(op, 1));
00997         }
00998       }
00999     }
01000   }
01001   
01002   new_images_generator.set_use_random_background(use_random_background);
01003 
01004   sort(tmp_model_points.begin(), tmp_model_points.end(), cmp_tmp_model_points);
01005 
01006   int min_views = int(min_view_rate * (double)view_nb);
01007   int i;
01008   model_points = new object_keypoint[max_point_number_on_model];
01009   vector< pair<object_keypoint, int> >::iterator it;
01010   
01011   for( it = tmp_model_points.begin(), i = 0;
01012       (it < tmp_model_points.end()) && (i < max_point_number_on_model) && (it->second >= min_views);
01013        it++, i++)
01014   {
01015     model_points[i].M[0] = it->first.M[0];
01016     model_points[i].M[1] = it->first.M[1];
01017     model_points[i].M[2] = it->first.M[2];
01018     model_points[i].scale = it->first.scale;
01019     model_points[i].class_index = i;
01020 
01021     if (i == 0)
01022       cout << "Point " << i << " detected " << it->second << " times." << endl;
01023   }
01024   cout << "... Point " << i << " detected " << it->second << " times (" 
01025        << view_nb << " generated views, "
01026        << min_view_rate*100 << "% minimum rate)." << endl;
01027 
01028   model_point_number = i;
01029 
01030   new_images_generator.set_object_keypoints(model_points, model_point_number);
01031 
01032   delete [] model_points_2d;
01033 }
01034 
01036 
01037 // VISUALIZATION: The following functions are useful for visualization only !!!
01038 
01039 void planar_object_recognizer::save_image_of_model_points(int patch_size, char * filename)
01040 {
01041   IplImage* model_image = mcvGrayToColor(new_images_generator.original_image);
01042 
01043   for(int i = 0; i < model_point_number; i++)
01044     cvCircle(model_image, 
01045              cvPoint((int)PyrImage::convCoordf(float(model_points[i].M[0]), int(model_points[i].scale), 0), 
01046                                                (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(float(model_points[i].M[1]), int(model_points[i].scale), 0)),
01047                                                (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(model_points[i].scale), 0), 
01048              mcvRainbowColor(int(model_points[i].scale)), 1);
01049 
01050   if (filename == 0)
01051     mcvSaveImage("model_points.bmp", model_image);
01052   else
01053     mcvSaveImage(filename, model_image);
01054 
01055   cvReleaseImage(&model_image);
01056 }
01057 
01058 IplImage * planar_object_recognizer::create_result_image(IplImage * input_image, 
01059                                                          bool p_draw_points,
01060                                                          bool p_draw_matches,
01061                                                          bool p_draw_object,
01062                                                          bool p_draw_model_image,
01063                                                          int line_width)
01064 {  
01065   concat_model_and_input_images(input_image, p_draw_model_image);
01066 
01067   if (p_draw_points) draw_points(line_width);
01068   if (p_draw_model_image)
01069   {
01070     if (p_draw_matches && object_is_detected) draw_matches(line_width);
01071     if (p_draw_object && object_is_detected) draw_model();
01072   }
01073   else
01074     if (p_draw_object && object_is_detected) draw_model();
01075 
01076   IplImage *im= model_and_input_images;
01077   model_and_input_images=0;
01078   return im;
01079 }
01080 
01081 void planar_object_recognizer::draw_model(void)
01082 {
01083   CvPoint C1 = cvPoint(int(u_input_image + detected_u_corner1), int(v_input_image + detected_v_corner1)); 
01084   CvPoint C2 = cvPoint(int(u_input_image + detected_u_corner2), int(v_input_image + detected_v_corner2)); 
01085   CvPoint C3 = cvPoint(int(u_input_image + detected_u_corner3), int(v_input_image + detected_v_corner3)); 
01086   CvPoint C4 = cvPoint(int(u_input_image + detected_u_corner4), int(v_input_image + detected_v_corner4)); 
01087   CvScalar col;
01088 
01089   col = cvScalar(0, 0, 0);
01090   cvLine(model_and_input_images, C1, C2, col, 6);
01091   cvLine(model_and_input_images, C2, C3, col, 6);
01092   cvLine(model_and_input_images, C3, C4, col, 6);
01093   cvLine(model_and_input_images, C4, C1, col, 6);
01094 
01095   col = cvScalar(255, 255, 255);
01096   cvLine(model_and_input_images, C1, C2, col, 2);
01097   cvLine(model_and_input_images, C2, C3, col, 2);
01098   cvLine(model_and_input_images, C3, C4, col, 2);
01099   cvLine(model_and_input_images, C4, C1, col, 2);
01100 }
01101 
01102 void planar_object_recognizer::save_one_image_per_match_input_to_model(IplImage * input_image, const char * matches_dir)
01103 {
01104   int patch_size = forest->image_width;
01105 
01106   for(int i = 0; i < detected_point_number; i++)
01107   {
01108     concat_model_and_input_images(input_image);
01109     draw_input_image_points();
01110 
01111     image_class_example * pv = &(detected_point_views[i]);
01112     float u = pv->point2d->u, v = pv->point2d->v;
01113     int s = int(pv->point2d->scale);
01114 
01115     if (u > (patch_size/2) && u < object_input_view->image[s]->width - (patch_size/2) && 
01116         v > (patch_size/2) && v < object_input_view->image[s]->height - (patch_size/2))
01117     {
01118       CvPoint ip = cvPoint(u_input_image + int(PyrImage::convCoordf(pv->point2d->u, int(pv->point2d->scale),0)), 
01119                            v_input_image + int(PyrImage::convCoordf(pv->point2d->v, int(pv->point2d->scale),0)));
01120 
01121       cvCircle(model_and_input_images, ip,     
01122                int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(pv->point2d->scale),0)), cvScalar(255, 255, 255), 1);
01123 
01124       float best_P = match_probabilities[i][0];
01125       int index_best_P = 0;
01126       for(int j = 0; j < model_point_number; j++)
01127       {
01128         if (match_probabilities[i][j] > 0.05)
01129         {
01130           object_keypoint * M = &(model_points[j]);
01131           int level = MIN(255, int(match_probabilities[i][j] / 0.2 * 255));
01132           CvScalar col = cvScalar(level, level, level);
01133           CvPoint mp = cvPoint(int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(M->M[0]), int(M->scale), 0)), 
01134                                int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(M->M[1]), int(M->scale), 0)));
01135 
01136           cvCircle(model_and_input_images, mp, (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(M->scale), 0), col, 1);
01137 
01138 
01139           cvLine(model_and_input_images, ip, mp, col, 1);
01140         }
01141         if (best_P < match_probabilities[i][j])
01142         {
01143           best_P = match_probabilities[i][j];
01144           index_best_P = j;
01145         }
01146       }
01147 
01148       {
01149         object_keypoint * M = &(model_points[index_best_P]);
01150         int level = MIN(255, int(match_probabilities[i][index_best_P] / 0.2 * 255));
01151         CvScalar col = cvScalar(level, level, level);
01152         CvPoint mp = cvPoint(int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(M->M[0]), int(M->scale), 0)), 
01153                              int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(M->M[1]), int(M->scale), 0)));
01154 
01155         cvCircle(model_and_input_images, mp, int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(M->scale),0)),col,1);
01156 
01157         cvLine(model_and_input_images, ip, mp, col, 1);
01158       }
01159     }
01160     {
01161       char filename[10000];
01162       sprintf(filename, "%s/match%04d.bmp", matches_dir, i);
01163       mcvSaveImage(filename, model_and_input_images);
01164     }
01165   }
01166 }
01167 
01168 void planar_object_recognizer::save_one_image_per_match_model_to_input(IplImage * input_image, const char * matches_dir)
01169 {
01170   int patch_size = forest->image_width;
01171 
01172   for(int j = 0; j < model_point_number; j++)
01173   {
01174     concat_model_and_input_images(input_image);
01175     //  draw_input_image_points();
01176 
01177     object_keypoint * M = &(model_points[j]);
01178     CvPoint mp = cvPoint(int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(M->M[0]), int(M->scale), 0)), 
01179                          int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(M->M[1]), int(M->scale), 0)));
01180     cvCircle(model_and_input_images, mp, 
01181              int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(M->scale),0)), cvScalar(0, 0, 0), 3);
01182     cvCircle(model_and_input_images, mp, 
01183              int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(M->scale),0)), cvScalar(255, 255, 255), 1);
01184 
01185     float best_P = match_probabilities[0][j];
01186     int index_best_P = 0;
01187     for(int i = 0; i < detected_point_number; i++)
01188     {
01189       image_class_example * pv = &(detected_point_views[i]);
01190       float u = pv->point2d->u, v = pv->point2d->v;
01191       int s = int(pv->point2d->scale);
01192 
01193       if (u > (patch_size / 2) && u < object_input_view->image[s]->width - (patch_size / 2) && 
01194           v > (patch_size / 2) && v < object_input_view->image[s]->height - (patch_size / 2))
01195       {
01196         if (best_P < match_probabilities[i][j])
01197         {
01198           best_P = match_probabilities[i][j];
01199           index_best_P = i;
01200         }
01201       }
01202     }
01203 
01204     {
01205       image_class_example * pv = &(detected_point_views[index_best_P]);
01206       float u = pv->point2d->u, v = pv->point2d->v;
01207       int s = int(pv->point2d->scale);
01208 
01209       CvPoint ip = cvPoint(u_input_image + int(PyrImage::convCoordf(u,s,0)), 
01210                            v_input_image + int(PyrImage::convCoordf(v,s,0)));
01211 
01212       cvCircle(model_and_input_images, ip,     
01213         int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f,int(pv->point2d->scale),0)), 
01214         cvScalar(0, 0, 0), 3);
01215       cvLine(model_and_input_images, ip, mp, cvScalar(0, 0, 0), 3);
01216 
01217       cvCircle(model_and_input_images, ip,     
01218               int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f,int(pv->point2d->scale),0)), 
01219               cvScalar(255, 255, 255), 2);
01220       cvLine(model_and_input_images, ip, mp, cvScalar(255, 255, 255), 2);
01221     }
01222 
01223     char image_name[1000];
01224     sprintf(image_name, "%s/match%04d.bmp", matches_dir, j);
01225     mcvSaveImage(image_name, model_and_input_images);
01226   }
01227 }
01228 
01229 
01230 void planar_object_recognizer::save_one_image_per_match(IplImage * input_image, const char * matches_dir)
01231 {
01232   int patch_size = forest->image_width;
01233 
01234   for(int i = 0; i < match_number; i++)
01235   {
01236     image_object_point_match * match = &(matches[i]);
01237 
01238     if (!match->inlier) 
01239       continue;
01240 
01241     concat_model_and_input_images(input_image);
01242 
01243     CvPoint M = cvPoint(int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(match->object_point->M[0]), int(match->object_point->scale), 0)), 
01244                         int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(match->object_point->M[1]), int(match->object_point->scale), 0)));
01245 
01246     cvCircle(model_and_input_images, 
01247              M, int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(match->object_point->scale), 0)), cvScalar(0, 0, 0), 3);
01248     cvCircle(model_and_input_images, 
01249              M, int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(match->object_point->scale), 0)), cvScalar(255, 255, 255), 1);
01250 
01251     CvPoint m = cvPoint(u_input_image + (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, int(match->object_point->scale), 0), 
01252                         v_input_image + (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, int(match->object_point->scale), 0));
01253 
01254     cvCircle(model_and_input_images, 
01255              m, int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(match->object_point->scale), 0)), cvScalar(0, 0, 0), 3);
01256     cvCircle(model_and_input_images, 
01257              m, int(PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(match->object_point->scale), 0)), cvScalar(255, 255, 255), 1);
01258 
01259     char image_name[1000];
01260     sprintf(image_name, "%s/match%04d.bmp", matches_dir, i);
01261     mcvSaveImage(image_name, model_and_input_images);
01262   }
01263 }
01264 
01265 
01266 void planar_object_recognizer::concat_model_and_input_images(IplImage * input_image, bool draw_model_image)
01267 {
01268   if (model_and_input_images != 0)
01269     cvReleaseImage(&model_and_input_images);
01270 
01271   if (draw_model_image)
01272   {
01273     model_and_input_images = 
01274       cvCreateImage(cvSize(max(new_images_generator.original_image->width, input_image->width), 
01275       new_images_generator.original_image->height + input_image->height + 10), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 3);
01276 
01277     cvSet(model_and_input_images, cvScalar(128, 128, 128));
01278 
01279     x0 = 0;
01280     y0 = 0;
01281     mcvPut(model_and_input_images, new_images_generator.original_image, x0, y0);
01282 
01283     u_input_image = 0;
01284     v_input_image = new_images_generator.original_image->height + 10;
01285     mcvPut(model_and_input_images, input_image, u_input_image, v_input_image);
01286   }
01287   else
01288   {
01289     model_and_input_images = cvCloneImage(input_image);
01290 
01291     x0 = 0;
01292     y0 = 0;
01293 
01294     u_input_image = 0;
01295     v_input_image = 0;
01296   }
01297 }
01298 
01299 void planar_object_recognizer::draw_points(int line_width)
01300 {
01301   draw_model_points(line_width);
01302   draw_input_image_points(line_width);
01303 }
01304 
01305 void planar_object_recognizer::draw_model_points(int line_width)
01306 {
01307   int patch_size = forest->image_width;
01308 
01309   for(int i = 0; i < model_point_number; i++)
01310     cvCircle(model_and_input_images, 
01311     cvPoint(x0 + (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(float(model_points[i].M[0]), int(model_points[i].scale), 0), 
01312             y0 + (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(float(model_points[i].M[1]), int(model_points[i].scale), 0)),
01313            (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(model_points[i].scale), 0), CV_RGB(0, 0, 255), line_width);
01314 }
01315 
01316 void planar_object_recognizer::draw_input_image_points(int line_width)
01317 {
01318   int patch_size = forest->image_width;
01319 
01320   for(int i = 0; i < detected_point_number; i++)
01321     cvCircle(model_and_input_images, 
01322              cvPoint(u_input_image + (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(detected_points[i].u, int(detected_points[i].scale), 0), 
01323                      v_input_image + (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(detected_points[i].v, int(detected_points[i].scale), 0)),
01324              (int)PyrImage::convCoordf(patch_size/2.f, int(detected_points[i].scale), 0), 
01325              mcvRainbowColor(int(detected_points[i].scale)), line_width);
01326 }
01327 
01328 void planar_object_recognizer::draw_matches(int line_width)
01329 {
01330   for(int i = 0; i < match_number; i++)
01331   {
01332     image_object_point_match * match = &(matches[i]);
01333 
01334     if (match->inlier)
01335     {
01336       CvScalar col = cvScalar(255, 255, 255);
01337 
01338       cvLine(model_and_input_images, 
01339         cvPoint(int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(match->object_point->M[0]), int(match->object_point->scale), 0)), 
01340                 int(PyrImage::convCoordf(float(match->object_point->M[1]), int(match->object_point->scale), 0))),
01341                  cvPoint(u_input_image + int(PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, int(match->image_point->scale), 0)), 
01342                          v_input_image + int(PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, int(match->image_point->scale), 0))),
01343         col, line_width);
01344     }
01345   }
01346 }
01347 
01348 void planar_object_recognizer::draw_inlier_matches(int line_width)
01349 {
01350   for(int i = 0; i < match_number; i++)
01351   {
01352     image_object_point_match * match = &(matches[i]);
01353 
01354     if (match->inlier)
01355     {
01356       cvLine(model_and_input_images, 
01357              cvPoint( u_input_image+int(match->image_point->u), v_input_image+int(match->image_point->v) ),
01358              cvPoint((int)match->object_point->M[0], (int)match->object_point->M[1]), 
01359              CV_RGB(255,0,0), line_width);
01360     }
01361   }
01362 }
01363 
01367 void planar_object_recognizer::check_target_size(IplImage *image)
01368 {
01369         int w = image->width;
01370         int h = image->height;
01371         int nbLev = new_images_generator.level_number;
01372 
01373         if (object_input_view->image[0]->width == w &&
01374                         object_input_view->image[0]->height ==h)
01375                 // Nothing to do: allocated resources have the right size
01376                 return; 
01377         
01378         //int u[4] = {-1, -1, -1, -1};
01379         //int v[4] = {-1, -1, -1, -1};
01380 
01381         if (new_images_generator.orientation_corrector != 0)
01382                 delete new_images_generator.orientation_corrector;
01383         new_images_generator.orientation_corrector = new keypoint_orientation_corrector(
01384                         w,h, new_images_generator.patch_size, nbLev);
01385 
01386         delete object_input_view;
01387         object_input_view = new object_view(w,h,nbLev);
01388         int yape_radius = point_detector->get_radius();
01389         delete point_detector;
01390         point_detector = new pyr_yape(w,h,nbLev);
01391         point_detector->set_radius(yape_radius);
01392 }
